title: TruckTrack
subtitle: Product that helps trucking business to be far more efficient and effective with their operations.
abstract: The first modern SaaS solution for trucking businesses, a huge, underserved industry. We are building a product that will help trucking business to be far more efficient and effective with their operations. Full, instant insight into business KPIs, fleet and human resources. Cost and earnings breakdown for all aspects of business. Business optimization recommendations.
author: Vuk NikoliÄ‡
